name: Louis Patrice
bio: Patrice is from Cite Soleil. He loves to learn and wants to understand more to become an expert in 3D modeling and rapid prototyping technologies. He is very excited about 3D printing. When he is not at the iLab, he spends a lot of his time reading and playing basketball. His favorite thing that he has learned at the iLab so far is how to 3D model in Rhino.
